product.description: The ID of the product of the campaign

product_details.description: The details of the product of the mint

collection.description: The collection that this product will belong to. If not specified, will use accounts default.

description.description: The product’s description, meant to be displayable to the customer. Use this field to optionally store a long form explanation of the product being sold for your own rendering purposes.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

name.description: The product’s name, meant to be displayable to the customer.

properties.description: Properties that help identify this product

items.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

segment.description: The segment ID to send the airdrop to

conditions.description: Comma separated list of conditions to match for the recipients

match.description: Determines whether to match any of the following conditions or all of them. Must be either any or all
